title: （返工好悶）盡答所有DSE, IB, GCSE 經濟學問題

replies.msg:
如同學有經濟學問題想問，我會盡量答。
大學本科問題都可以，我盡力而為，隨便溫故知新。
唔留TG, 唔接私補, 唔敢包100% 正確。

相關資歷：A-LEVEL 經濟 A, LSE 經濟學碩士畢業

[IB Econ]
Use production possibility curve diagrams to explain the differences between actual output and potential output and between economic growth and economic development. (10 marks)

quote.msg:
[IB Econ]
Use production possibility curve diagrams to explain the differences between actual output and potential output and between economic growth and economic development. (10 marks)

replies.msg:
不如唔好只係POST 個考試問題, 講下你有咩唔明而答唔到。
如果唔係，其實網上已有好多MODEL ANSWER ^^"

quote.msg:
[IB Econ]
Use production possibility curve diagrams to explain the differences between actual output and potential output and between economic growth and economic development. (10 marks)

replies.msg: 太悶。決定點都解釋一下，請等等。

quote.msg:
[IB Econ]
Use production possibility curve diagrams to explain the differences between actual output and potential output and between economic growth and economic development. (10 marks)

不如唔好只係POST 個考試問題, 講下你有咩唔明而答唔到。
如果唔係，其實網上已有好多MODEL ANSWER ^^"

[IB Econ]
Use production possibility curve diagrams to explain the differences between actual output and potential output and between economic growth and economic development. (10 marks)

replies.msg:
Production Possibility Curve (PPC) 係一條曲線（CONCAVE TO ORIGIN, 點解通常係CONCAVE? 另外有機會再講) 顯示一個生產單位（國家或城市等）既"最高"可能生產既不同組合。現實世界當然好多不同既野（電腦，生果，酒店服務等），所以一般討論會簡化，如我張圖：產品A 同產品B。
點為之"最高" -> 簡單咁講就係在現有的科技條件下，已盡最大可能善用所用資源。

"最高"可能生產既不同組合就係POTENTIAL OUTPUTS，個條PPC 曲線上所有既點就顯示出所有POTENTIAL OUTPUTS。
咁現實情況當然唔一定可以盡最大可能善用所用資源，咁現實情況(ACTUAL OUTPUT) 同"最高"可能就會有分別。就好似我個圖 點2017 同 點2018 咁。

假設點2017 係 2017 年香港既總產出，咁香港在2017年就不能盡最大可能善用所用資源，個點會位於PPC 內。但2018 年情況就唔同，點2018處於PCC1 上，即在現有的科技條件下，已盡最大可能善用所用資源生產。

2017 -> 2018，就是Economic Growth（更善用資源）。

PPC1 -> PCC2 就係Economic Development，一般例子有科技提升等。

replies.msg:
多謝你詳盡的解釋。

其實我之前都有上網search過依一題(2005年題目)。

不過economic development的畫法就好有趣，所以先想放上嚟討論。
佢將Consumer goods/luxuries放y-axis，然後將merit goods放x-axis。
解釋係因為Economic development除咗consumption of goods and services之外，仲會考慮埋其他影響quality of life的因素，例如life expectancy, literacy rate等等。

上網見到的解釋係左面係economic growth, 右面係economic development。
當年除左lse 仲有報邊間？
樓主做緊咩工？

PPF economic growth actual potential 見得多
Development 未見過

金融經濟學問題：
最近有咩股仔可以介紹吓？
For a normal AR(2) process, can you give expressions for the forecast error variance decompositions h-period ahead in terms of the identified shocks? (Monetary economics)

我知open market operation 會令ms 改變，但點解買普通bonds 就推ma?

Interest 係dse syllabus 入面可以one man economy 出現？

另外 inflation出現, expected inflation 出現, an increase in inflation rate, an increase in inflation rate 分別點解釋 ma mt?
